cgcloud__Payment_Tactic__c.name: cgcloud__Payment_Tactic__c
cgcloud__Payment_Tactic__c.description: This object represents the relationship between Fund and Payment Tactic junction objects.

LastActivityDate.description: Date on which a user last performed an action on the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Adjustment_Type__c.description: If a payment is to be adjusted, this field defines the type of adjustment.

cgcloud__Amount_Offset__c.description: Tactic payout that's pending after having associated payment tactic funds.

cgcloud__Calculation_Date_From__c.description: Start date of the calculation timeframe for the payment tactic.

cgcloud__Calculation_Date_Thru__c.description: End date of the calculation timeframe for the payment tactic.

cgcloud__Custom_Calculation_Date_From__c.description: Start date of the custom calculation timeframe for the payment tactic.

cgcloud__Custom_Calculation_Date_Thru__c.description: End date of the custom calculation timeframe for the payment tactic.

cgcloud__Fund_Distribution_Metric__c.description: Distribution metric that a user can choose to calculate funding percentage and payout amount.

cgcloud__Has_Calculated_Amount__c.description: Indicates when a payment is updated and saved so that the recalculation of the tactic payout amount can be triggered.

cgcloud__KPI_Subset__c.description: KPI Subset defines the KPIs that are shown in the Payment Tactic KPI Grid of this payment tactic.

cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Fund_Summary__c.description: Summary of the Payment Tactic Funds that's associated to the payment.

cgcloud__Pending_Amount__c.description: Pending amount that's to be paid.

cgcloud__Promotion_Slogan__c.description: Promotion slogan of the source promotion to which the tactic is related.

cgcloud__Promotion_Tactic__c.description: Combination of the source promotion and tactic name that's used in the payment.

cgcloud__Requires_Fund__c.description: Defines whether the payment requires funds to be approved.

cgcloud__Tactic_Payout__c.description: Payment amount that's allocated for the specified tactic. Depending on the orientation of the payment, you can enter either negative or positive values in this field. For positive payments, only positive values are allowed and for negative payments, only negative values are allowed.

cgcloud__Tactic_Template__c.description: Reference to the tactic template of the tactic.

cgcloud__To_Date_Paid_Amount__c.description: Amount that's paid until the current date.
